job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support rather than developing new AI models or applications. While it mentions AI integration and fine-tuning, the core responsibilities are centered around application support and problem-solving within an AI-augmented workflow, not core AI engineering.

phrases.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand the nature of customer issues and how they are being handled by AI, which is a business context for the role.

phrases.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
phrases.justification: This requires understanding the limitations of the AI system in addressing business needs and customer problems.

phrases.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
phrases.justification: This highlights the business goal of providing customer support and integrating AI to achieve it.
This implies making changes or adjustments to the AI system, which could involve model improvement.

phrases.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
phrases.justification: Providing feedback on AI outputs is a step towards model improvement or fine-tuning.

phrases.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
phrases.justification: Directly mentions involvement in the process of adjusting AI models.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools can involve aspects of model evaluation and adaptation.

phrases.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
phrases.justification: Prototyping and testing are software development activities, even if focused on AI tools.

phrases.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
